Producer: Arianne Fraser, Delphine Perrier, Jon Silk, Javier Chapa
Production Co: Silk Mass, Lantica Media, Buzzfeed Studios, Diamond Films, Chocolatito, Mucho Mas Media
Synopsis: Josh Lucas (Ford v Ferrari, Yellowstone) stars in this edge-of-your-seat action thriller from the director of Rambo: Last Blood. Oilman Paul Sturges' (Josh Lucas) idyllic family vacation turns into a nightmare when they encounter a ferocious megalodon shark that will stop at nothing to protect its territory. Stranded and under constant attack, Paul and his family must somehow find a way to get his family back to shore alive before it strikes again in this epic battle between humans and nature.
Title: The Black Demon
